component.name: Emoji Mart
component.summary: A modern popup emoji picker for desktop, based on the Emoji Mart web component.

description.p: Launch the emoji picker with your favorite keyboard shortcut, and select an emoji to paste in the clipboard, or directly in the focused text input on X11.

ul.li: 🍾 Built as a popup: quick invocation through the system custom shortcuts, and disappears when not needed, does not stay as a standalone window, does not run in the background
🔎 Search text box automatically focused and ready to type when invoked
⌨️ Use the keyboard to navigate and select emojis
✒️ On x11 the selected emoji is also automatically pasted to the currently focused text input.
🌍 Complete translation in 22 languages, it will use your system language automatically
⚔️ Cross-platform, it can be installed natively on Linux, MacOS, or Windows
🧑‍🚀 Built with Tauri, TypeScript, and Svelte
